com.segment.backo

Class Backo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.segment.backo.Backo

  • public class Backo
extends Object
    Backo implements the "full jitter" backoff policy as described in this article Exponential Backoff And Jitter .

    Create your own instance with the Backo.Builder class. Instances of backoff are stateless, so you can create them once and share them across threads throughout your app.

    See Also:
    Exponential Backoff And Jitter
